channel.title: Archives on Matt Carrier
channel.description: Recent content in Archives on Matt Carrier

item.title: SoundWall Kinect
item.description: SoundWall is an open source digital drum machine which can be controlled using the Xbox Kinect SDK for Windows using hand motions and voice commands.

item.title: SSU Map Progress
item.description: Darwin Lobby Chairs

item.title: 3D Maze
item.description: This was part of an assignment for my CS215 class. It involved coding a maze that uses recursion to randomly generate the maze. For extra credit I went nuts and added DirectX support so I could have the whole thing drawn in 3D.

item.title: Linear Algebra applied to 3D Graphics
item.description: I made this video as part of a presentation I gave for extra credit in my linear algebra class. It is just showing how matrices are applied in computer graphics.

item.title: Monster for my Maze Project
item.description: After some play testing, friends told me they couldn’t tell which was the player and which was the monster, so I decided to make this to clear up any confusion.

item.title: IT Helpdesk map screens
item.description: Here are some screen shots from the map I was working on while on my winter break this year.

item.title: Shotgun
item.description: This is a weapon for the mod I am making. Polys: 850 | Verts: 902

item.title: Colt 45
item.description: I am modeling this for a Half-Life 2 mod I am making. Polys: 1359 (The in game version, which is this one here with faces removed from the other side is 912 polys.) | The texture isn’t done yet.

item.title: 1940 Ford WIP
item.description: This is a truck that I am making for my mod. I still have much to do with it.

item.title: LG KG300 Cell Phone

item.title: Head of Constantine
item.description: I modeled this for an extra credit assignment for one of my art history classes. I didn’t have enough time to finish the model before the due date though. Eventually I want to learn how to use zbrush and add more detail to it.

item.title: Earth Shader Test
item.description: This is a shader I was working on for the planet earth for a solar system model I was making.

item.title: Lighsaber
item.description: An elegant weapon for a more civilized age.

item.title: Virtual High School
item.description: The virtual high school or Windsor High school map was a project I did in my senior year for school. (2005) My goal was to create the whole school in a 3d environment which could be explored in the Half-Life 2 game engine. I figured the project would take between 80 and 100 hours. It ended up taking over 200 hours. This was a great learning experience for me. While it did end up taking me so long to do it, I enjoyed almost every minute of it.

item.title: Virtual High School Install Guide
item.description: First you need Steam. http://www.steampowered.com Then you need to either buy a copy of Half-Life 2 or The Orange Box to run the mod. This can be picked up retail for between 20 and 50 dollars. It can also be purchased directly from steam. To install copy the “Virtual High School” folder (copy the folder that is in the same folder as the readme.txt file. Don’t copy the dated folder.) to your SourceMods folder in your steam directory.

item.title: Custom computer chassis concept
item.description: This was a model I had to create for work. I had to change the color schemes and decals so our customer at my job could have a good visualization of what they were going to get.

item.title: Windsor High School Tour
item.description: The virtual high school or Windsor High school map was a project I did in my senior year for school. (2005) My goal was to create the whole school in a 3d environment which could be explored in the Half-Life 2 game engine. This is Windsor High School in Sonoma County California.

item.title: Windsor High School - Screens
item.description: I did this as my senior project in high school.

item.title: dm_lightsabers
item.description: I made this map because I found out a funny way to make a lightsabers. This is still a beta and has a few glitches but please give me your input on what you think of the map, and any ideas to go with it. I hope you enjoy this map. I know my friends and I did. Download dm_lightsabers (ic_lightsabersBETA3)

item.title: fy_glassworld
item.description: This is a map made after one of my favorite Counter-Strike 1.6 maps fy_iceworld. The only difference is I added a little twist to the map for a little more crazy. DANGER ALL GLASS CAN EVENTUALLY BE BROKEN! (Except for the Outer 6 Walls) Download fy_glassworld (for Counter-Strike 1.6)
